channel.title: Start Development on Flutter Master Docs
channel.description: Recent content in Start Development on Flutter Master Docs

item.title: Docs Site
item.description: Getting Starting 1. Hugo Install Install the HugoCLI.(https://gohugo.io/getting-started/installing/) # Use Mac Case brew install hugo # Use Windows Case(PowerShell) choco install hugo -confirm 2. Git Clone Clone the Docs source code. git clone https://github.com/MacrotechJP-OSS/flutter-master-docs.git 3. Hugo Start-up Start hugo server. hugo server Creating 4. Hugo PublicDir Create After creating the content, create HTML for publication. HTML is created under docs. hugo Deploying 5. Git Commit & Push Push the created

item.title: Flutter Master
item.description: Using Docker + VSCode Using VSCode（Online） Using VSCode（Local） その他情報 ディレクトリ構成 libフォルダ配下 ├── constant/ .. 値に変更がない固定値
